item.title: IE Singapore and UOB will assist Singaporean companies in their international expansion efforts
item.description: International Enterprise (IE) Singapore and United Overseas Bank (UOB) have partnered to support Singaporean companies engaged in international trade and expansion. This collaboration marks IE Singapore’s first strategic partnership with a Singaporean bank. This partnership aims to provide Singaporean businesses with tailored trade and financing solutions, enhanced access to in-market networks, business partners, and service providers across Asia, including connections with UOB’s global clientele. The agreement was formalized by Chua Taik Him, Deputy CEO of IE Singapore, and Frederick Chin, Managing Director and Head of Group Wholesale Banking at UOB.
